about_the_game:
What would you do if you woke up inside a cell, in an unknown place, looking more like you're in a fiction / horror movie?
The first step would be to try to find out where and why you are in that place, right?

But what if, upon waking up, you were given instructions on where and why you are in this place? Would you still have the doubts?

What if, addition to all of this, you were connected to some sort of mechanism that kept you alive, and you felt that this whole environment is somehow hostile towards you?

That definetely sounds like a horror/fiction movie, right? But it is not! This is VOLLUN

Vollun is a suspense game with elements of terror and adventure, which mystery hiding in every corridor.

Survive and discover the truth about how and why you ended up in this place. And, if you can, escape before the time runs out!

PREPARE YOURSELF! THE SPHERE AWAKENED AND WITH HER, THE CHAOS!

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: Vollun is a first-person with great focus on story, puzzles and exploration. You wake up in a strange place full of mysteries. Something happened in this place and you're not alone.
